kpi_info.title: Expected cell size
kpi_info.use: This KPI indicated the expected cell size based on the operator configured parameter LNCEL:expectedCellSize. The cell size is calculated from raw PM tables. For higher aggregation levels, the cell size is averaged.
kpi_info.formula:
TIMING_ADV_SET_INDEX = 1 , cell size = 2.1 km
TIMING_ADV_SET_INDEX = 2 , cell size = 5 km
TIMING_ADV_SET_INDEX = 3 , cell size = 10 km
TIMING_ADV_SET_INDEX = 4 , cell size = 15 km
TIMING_ADV_SET_INDEX = 5 , cell size = 30 km
TIMING_ADV_SET_INDEX = 6 , cell size = 60 km
TIMING_ADV_SET_INDEX = 7 , cell size = 100 km
